name: Ruuf
headline: Managed marketplace for solar in Latam
description: We offer no-money-down installations that generate free money for homeowners from day one. We are digitalizing the whole process of going solar. Instead of using traditional forms and leaving it up to customers to fill them, we use technology to take all that burden off our customers plate. We only ask for an address and offer free instant quotes.

founders.name: Domingo Garcia-Huidobro, Founder
founders.description: Second time founder, crazy about all things related to decarbonization. I have been in the solar world since 2015. I am starting to write about technology and renewables :)

founders.name: Tomás Campos, Founder
founders.description:
Electrical Engineer from Chile. I love the intersection between energy and technology.
Lets decarbonize the world!

founders.name: Pedro Saratscheff, Founder
founders.description: Ex Fintual (S18) and ex Google. I love coding and getting stuff done.

generated_description:
### Ruuf: Simplifying Solar in Latin America

**Overview**  
Ruuf is a dynamic startup founded in 2022, nestled in Santiago, Chile, and part of Y Combinator's W23 batch. With a team of 23 passionate employees, Ruuf is on a mission to revolutionize the solar energy marketplace in Latin America.  

**Mission**  
At its core, Ruuf is about accessibility and ease for homeowners looking to transition to solar energy. They specialize in managed marketplace solutions that take the complexity out of purchasing and installing solar panels. With a simple focus on innovation, Ruuf offers no-money-down installations that allow homeowners to start generating savings from day one.

**How It Works**  
The process is designed to be straightforward. Rather than relying on cumbersome paperwork and forms, Ruuf leverages technology to streamline everything. Customers only need to provide their address to receive a free instant quote. The entire journey from inquiry to installation is digitalized, making it user-friendly and hassle-free.

1. **Input Information**: Users answer basic questions about their home and energy consumption.
2. **Receive a Proposal**: Ruuf generates and presents a comprehensive proposal, complete with financing options.
3. **Schedule an Expert Review**: Interested customers can schedule a visit with a solar expert to finalize details.

Everything's included: from panels and inverters to installation, monitoring, and support—there are no hidden surprises.

**Financing Made Easy**  
Ruuf understands that financial barriers can deter homeowners from opting for solar. That’s why they offer flexible financing options, including interest-free credit card plans and low monthly payments, all without requiring any initial investment.

**Recognition and Impact**  
Ruuf is making waves in the energy industry, being tagged in categories like solar power, climate tech, and renewable energy. They've been featured as one of the top 100 startups in Chile for 2023, demonstrating its rapid growth and influence in the sustainability sector.

**Conclusion**  
Ruuf is not just another solar company; it’s a tech-driven solution to democratizing access to renewable energy in Latin America. With their innovative approach, they are well-positioned to lead the charge towards a more sustainable future. If you're looking to make the switch to solar, Ruuf might just be the easiest path forward.

For more information, visit [Ruuf's website](https://www.ruuf.cl).
